price: 113. Ma aha isku wada mid; waxaa ka mid ah ehlul Kitaabka koox toosan18; waxay akhriyaan Aayadaha Alle waqtiyada habeenka oo sujuudaan.
arabic: ۞ لَيۡسُواْ سَوَآءٗۗ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أُمَّةٞ قَآئِمَةٞ يَتۡلُونَ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَهُمۡ يَسۡجُدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laysū sawāan min ahli al-kitābi ummatun qāimatun yatlūna āyāti al-lahi ānāa al-layli wahum yasjudūna
